title: Woodcarving & Rail Bike
subTitle: 舊山線時光軌跡：三義木雕與鐵道自行車
intro: Explore the soul of Sanyi: Wood and Iron. Ride the unique Rail Bike on the Old Mountain Line and witness the 'Pompeii of Taiwan' - Longteng Bridge.
transportation: **Train** to Sanyi Station + **Taxi/Scooter** or **Taiwan Tourist Shuttle**.

spots.name: Sanyi Wood Sculpture Museum (三義木雕博物館)
spots.description: The only museum in Taiwan dedicated to wood sculpture. Walk through Shuimei Street to smell the cypress aroma.

spots.name: Old Mountain Line Rail Bike (舊山線鐵道自行車)
spots.description: Must book 30 days in advance! Route A takes you over the stunning Yutengping Iron Bridge; Route C goes through tunnels to Liyutan Reservoir.

spots.name: Longteng Broken Bridge (龍騰斷橋)
spots.description: A masterpiece of railway engineering destroyed by the 1935 earthquake. The red brick ruins are a hauntingly beautiful historical site.

title: Slow City Life Lab
subTitle: 慢城生活實驗室：南庄老街與神仙谷
intro: Experience the coexistence of Hakka, Saisiyat, and Atayal cultures in Nanzhuang, a certified International Slow City.
transportation: **Taiwan Tourist Shuttle (Nanzhuang Line)** from Zhunan Station.

spots.name: Nanzhuang Old Street (南庄老街)
spots.description: Walk through Osmanthus Alley (Guihua Lane) and see the historic 'Washing Pit' (Xishankeng), a traditional community social hub.

spots.name: Shenxianggu (神仙谷)
spots.description: A sacred place for the Atayal people and a filming location for 'Seediq Bale'. Witness the magnificent canyon and waterfalls.

spots.name: Kangji Suspension Bridge (康濟吊橋)
spots.description: Enjoy the sunset over the Zhonggang River and explore the cultural shops in the Shisanjian Old Street area.

title: Strawberry & Beauty Soup
subTitle: 冬日草莓與美人湯：大湖泰安療癒
intro: Perfect for winter (Dec-Apr). Pick fresh strawberries in Dahu and soak in the carbonated 'Beauty Soup' of Tai'an Hot Springs.

spots.name: Dahu Wineland Resort (大湖酒莊)
spots.description: Pick your own strawberries (Fengxiang or Xiangshui varieties) and try strawberry sausage and wine.

spots.name: Tai'an Hot Spring (泰安溫泉)
spots.description: Discovered in 1908. The weak alkaline carbonate spring leaves skin smooth. Stay in hotels that blend architecture with nature.

spots.name: Qingan Tofu Street (清安豆腐街)
spots.description: Also known as Xishuikeng Old Street. Famous for various tofu dishes, including the unique black stinky tofu.

title: Wind & Pasture Dialogue
subTitle: 海風與風車的對話：海線風能與牧場
intro: From the giant wind turbines of the coast to the European-style pastures. A journey of green energy and leisure.

spots.name: Cape of Good Hope (後龍好望角)
spots.description: Stand beneath giant wind turbines and watch trains pass by the coastline. A stunning visual impact.

spots.name: Baishatun Gongtian Temple (白沙屯拱天宮)
spots.description: Home to the 'Pink Supercar' Mazu. Experience the unique and spontaneous pilgrimage culture of Taiwan.

spots.name: Flying Cow Ranch (飛牛牧場)
spots.description: A pioneer in leisure agriculture. Feed calves, milk cows, and enjoy a picnic on the vast green grassland.

title: Badlands & Glamping
subTitle: 山岳與廢墟美學：火炎山探險與豪華露營
intro: For the adventurous. Hike the 'Grand Canyon of Taiwan' and stay in world-class glamping sites.

spots.name: Huoyanshan (火炎山)
spots.description: Listed as one of the '100 Minor Peaks'. The gravel badlands create a dramatic, flame-like landscape.

spots.name: Miaoli Glamping (苗栗豪華露營)
spots.description: Miaoli has the highest density of glamping sites in Taiwan. Enjoy camping without the hassle of bringing equipment.

spots.name: Shishan Historic Trail (獅山古道)
spots.description: Visit Quanhua Temple, built into the rock face. A perfect example of architecture harmonizing with nature.

title: Hakka Food & Craft
subTitle: 客家食旅與工藝巡禮：舌尖上的苗栗
intro: A journey of taste and touch. Savor authentic Hakka cuisine, experience indigo dyeing, and drink Oriental Beauty Tea.

spots.name: Crystal Dumpling (阿蘭姐水晶餃)
spots.description: A unique breakfast memory for locals. Try the chewy crystal dumplings or the giant meatballs with shaved ice.

spots.name: Zhuo Ye Cottage (卓也小屋)
spots.description: Experience DIY Indigo Dyeing. Create your own unique scarf or bag in this eco-friendly park.

spots.name: Tongluo Tea Factory (銅鑼茶廠)
spots.description: Taste the honey-scented Oriental Beauty Tea and chase trains passing through the tea plantations.
